Custom options for character filters and token filtersare specified separately as named constructs, and then referenced in the normalizerdefinition as illustrated below.
A custom normalizer named "my_custom_normalizer" is defined in the"normalizers" section of the index definition.The normalizer is composed of two character filters and three token filters: elision,lowercase, and customized asciifolding filter "my_asciifolding".
